communitools.title: Communitools
content: Inspired by borrowing infrequently used tools from my neighbours, I decided to develop a platform where users can together create a neighbourhood tool library. Depending on what a constitutes 'nearby' to a user, they will see all of the tools their neighbours have and are willing to lend out.
Built with: Rails, PostgreSQL, Devise, and Bootstrap

personalWebsite.title: Personal Website
content: This website! It serves to showcase my experience and my past, current, and future projects.
Built with: Github Pages and Bulma
